item.title: A Strava plugin for bitbar
item.description: Bitbar is a cool little app for MacOS that allows you to run tiny programs that display useful information in the menu bar. These can be anything from current weather conditions, to information about digital ocean droplets, or a timer application. Being that I am also a big fan of strava, I decided to put together a strava plugin for bitbar. Wish I could put up some more impressive numbers here!
